text: Burleson is a city in Texas. During the 2020 Census, there were 47,641 people living in Burleson. Burleson is in both Johnson and Tarrant counties and is a suburb of Fort Worth. Kelly Clarkson was living in Burleson when she won the first American Idol contest. == References == Category:Cities in Texas Category:Settlements in Tarrant County, Texas
title: Burleson, Texas
